article.title: L-3 to Provide Full-Motion Video Receivers
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Corp., Salt Lake City, Utah, is being awarded a $11,315,945 firm fixed price and cost plus fixed fee contract for full-motion video receivers and interim contractor support. The contracting activity is the U.S. Air Force Life CycleÂ Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Mass.
